rules_text:
[i]Forager[/i] – When Mozu, Tragic Start enters, look at the top five cards of your library. Reveal a land card from among them and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your library in any order.
[i]Aptitude[/i] – Whenever Mozu attacks, if you attacked with a Noble this combat, put a +1/+1 counter onto Mozu and draw a card.
